title: bug: `AmazonopensearchserviceDestinationConfiguration` is not supported for Firehose-Streams
raw_output: {'files_to_modify': ['localstack/services/cloudformation/models/kinesisfirehose.py', 'localstack/services/firehose/provider.py', 'localstack/services/firehose/mappers.py', 'localstack/aws/api/firehose/__init__.py', 'tests/integration/test_firehose.py'], 'reasoning': '1. kinesisfirehose.py: Main cloudformation resource model listing destination configs; adding and validating support for AmazonopensearchserviceDestinationConfiguration requires changes here. 2. provider.py: Firehose stream provisioning and runtime handling of destination configs; logic must handle, create, and validate OpenSearch destination. 3. mappers.py: Maps delivery stream configuration into descriptions and runtime objects—parallel support for OpenSearch alongside Elasticsearch. 4. __init__.py: Definition of config structs (TypedDicts) for destination configs; must be up-to-date and included in type checks/validations. 5. test_firehose.py: Integration tests may only cover the Elasticsearch config; tests should be extended to validate OpenSearch destination behavior for Firehose streams.'}
